review:
one of the best suspense movies i have ever seen. rana, abhishek, pratiek shine through their characters. the music is immortal for sure. i was actually shocked to see that the movie isn't a remake or a copy. well done team, this is a gem.
i highly recommend this movie.

one of the best movies in action/thriller genre. i was going through some critics review and was thinking are they dumb or what giving low ratings to a film that deserves so much more exposing how the drug mafia works highly underrated movie

really a great movie............role played by rana as dj joki in the movie very well.no one can say that this was his debut movie in bollywood.at the end of the movie in the climax scene,he(rana) is the only one who revealed the secret of the mystery of michael berbosa that was fantastic

best movie against drugs n corruption !
abhishek bachchan's role is amazing, rana n pratiek is also very good work in this movie.
dum maaro dum !

very nice movie.... must watch for youngsters like me
best movie bollywood needs to make movies like this
thought movie would be of some bore kind but the movie stands interesting till end
great composition of songs in the movie
best movie to watch wen not interested in watching same genre movies again and again.
